choices: Someone talks to you at the bar
You go back to play more pool
You keep looking at your app
A random add pops up on your phone for a new app
1.content:
It’s Friday night and it started out like most nights. Tom and I were going to a bar downtown we liked, there were usually some girls there, sometimes they wanted to hang out, some nights they didn’t. So far tonight it was not one of those nights. Only a few girls in the bar and none of them were real good lookers. My name is Alex by the way. In many ways I guess I’m your normal recent college graduate. I have a job I hate, a few close friends, some money but not enough to have a lot of fun, but enough to have some fun.
We got access to the pool table around 9:30 and by 10:30 I was up two games to one. Our deal was simple, the games are split either way, but the winner had to buy the other a beer. I was about to win my third game when I sunk the eight ball by accident.
“How could you be that stupid man,” Tom said. “I’ll take another.” I cursed under my breath and went up to the bar.
“Another round,” I said. Jake the bartender knew us well and started to get Tom’s Budweiser and me a craft beer, today it looked like an IPA. As I waited, I got out my phone and looked over my shoulder, Tom was racking the balls, it was safe to open my phone. I wasn’t proud of the fact that I used a dating app, but the bar scene had not proven to find anyone I really liked. I looked at new profile that popped up. She was kind of cute, a year older than me, but a little homely. I thought about swiping right, then I noticed she was a smoker, which I didn’t like, and I swiped left.
1.title: Out on a Friday Night

choices: She joins you at the pool table
She asks you to come back to the bar
She convinces you to stay at the bar
She walks away, upset with you
She gives you her number, but then goes away
11.content:
“A little picky there,” said the voice to my right. I turned my head and saw a lone female figure that I hadn’t noticed sitting down beside me.
“She smoked,” I said.
“Socially,” she said. “She might have quit if needed, especially at this stage in life.
“You were looking pretty closely,” I said as Jake brought the beers. I nodded my thanks, I knew the beers were going on my card.
“I’m curious about dating apps,” she said. “Been on a couple, but it seems to just be people looking for hookups.”
“Some are like that, but I think others mean well.”
“Do you think it is true that it just makes it easier for people who look hot?”
I thought about that for a second, she had a point, much like in a bar, the first thing you notice is looks, but then I knew I would try to find out more. “I think looks help, but in the end, its the same as meeting in a bar, it takes more to hold attention, it takes a person you want to talk to.”
She smiled, nodded, then reached out her hand. “I can go with that, I’m Erin.” I took a second to look Erin over. She was wearing black slacks and green tank top. Her blonde hair was down past her shoulders and wavy, I normally didn’t like blondes, but she seemed nice enough, in other areas as well. “Alex,” I said, taking her hand and shaking it softly. “Listen, I need to take this beer over to my friend, but you’re welcome to join us."
11.title: Someone talks to you at the bar

choices: She offers a chance at a new app
She starts to focus on Tom
111.content:
I could see her think about it, then nod her head. “Sounds like fun,” she said. She grabbed her drink, some cocktail, I couldn’t tell what it was, but it would only be something I’d be worried about if I felt a desire to get her another one.
“Alex, you know better then to bring ladies over here,” Tom said as he set to break the game. “Us only at the table.”
“Worried that you’ll be beat by a girl?” Erin said as she walked up and half sat on the edge of the table.
“Not one bit, its just kind of a thing we have.” Tom took the beer I handed him and took a small sip. “The pool table is where we go when we don’t find the fish we want in the sea.” I winced at the pun. Erin laughed.
“Well, tell you what,” she placed a quarter on the table. “I call winner, and I will see if you can swim with the sharks.”
“I like her,” Tom said. “Deal.” He lined up the break and shot it forward, sinking a ball on the break, and the game began. “So, Erin, what makes you like Old Alex here?”
She started off “I sat down next to him and,”
“We started talking,” I interrupted.
“About the dating app he was on,” she finished. I winced as Tom sunk in another ball and his next shot looked lined up.
“He tries to hide it but its pretty obvious,” Tom said, he sunk the next shot, but also scratched. I had my turn.
“Its kinda cute, but he shouldn’t be ashamed,” she added. Nowadays a lot of people use dating apps.
“I don’t,” Tom said. “Too much about looks and too many shallow girls.”
“So basically no one that would hook up with you,” Erin said. As they talked, I sunk my shot and went to line up my second.
“What do you say Alex?” Tom asked the question right as I was taking my shot, I missed. I didn’t know if I was more upset that I missed or what he brought up.
I looked at Erin, then back at Tom. I was ashamed at having to use an app to date, but I felt the need. “Doesn’t hurt anything,” I said. “Doesn’t cost that much, and if it works, great, if not, then I spent a little money trying.”
“Is it more for hook ups or are you actually looking?” I didn’t like that she kept asking, but something about how she was asking, I felt like it was okay to answer. I looked as Tom sunk another shot.
“I don’t know,” I was honest. “Don’t know what I want right now. I could see Erin looking at me up and down, almost as if she was sizing me up.
111.title: She joins you at the pool table

1111.content:
She finally said. “I still got winner. But I have a wager I’d like to make.”
“Go for it,” Tom said.
“I’ve been helping a friend with a new form of dating app. If I win, you both have to try it out.”
“I’m not trying a dating app,” Tom said.
“It’ll be free,” she insisted. “And, if I lose, I’ll sleep with the one who wins.”
I could see Tom thinking about it. I felt like I was getting the short end of the stick, considering Tom was up already. He looked at me, cocked his head to the side as if to say why not. I shrugged my shoulders. I wouldn’t be getting lucky unless I actually got lucky. “What’s the pro of this app?” He looked back at Erin as he asked the question. “Why would I want to try it?”
“Because I promise you’ll find someone you like and will like you back. In many ways.”
“Fuck it,” he said. “Sounds good to me.”
“Dude, you’re already up.”
“By one ball, you can still win.”
I put my head down, debating my options. I didn’t even notice Erin walking up beside me.
She leaned in to my ear, “Don’t worry, you’ll be happy at the end of the night, one way or another. I think you have this game.”
He words did give me some confidence. “Okay, deal.” She reached out her hand and I shook it. Tom did the same. He then lined up his shot, and missed.
1111.title: She offers a chance at a new app

11111.content: I did end up winning the game, and Tom watched as Erin and I traded shots back and forth. It came down to the eight ball. She had her shot to win the game, but barely missed the shot. My shot looked perfectly lined up Erin stood on the other side of shot, I could see down her tank top as I tried to line up my shot. I took the shot, and the cue ball struck the eight ball and the eight ball went right in the hole.
11111.title: You Win

choices: The app is pretty normal, just enhanced
111112.content:
I had hit it with too much top spin and the cue ball went right in after it, I lost, she had won. Tom applauded, at first I didn’t know why, then I remembered we were guaranteed with the app, so he must of thought that he would be getting lucky after losing the game. I put the cue stick up and walked over to Erin.
“Good game,” I said as I held out my hand. “You won.”
“Sometimes the breaks don’t turn out the way you wanted. But I think you’ll be okay, either way. Come, I will buy this round, we’ll take a seat and get started. She motioned to the bartender and we walked over to a table near the back.
111112.title: Erin Won

choices: It would make us the ideal men for the women we chose
It would turn us both into the women we chose
One of us was about to become female
1111122.content:
“Okay, so first, you’ll need to download the app.” She gave us the name of the app and we both did. It took a few minutes to download and she explained the process. “So first you both are going to punch in some details to your preferences, just like any other app, but in this case, it is mostly on the physical side to start.”
The app appeared on my phone and it first asked if I was a male or female, I clicked male. Then it asked for what I wanted my date to look like. It gave several options. I picked red hair, I was always a sucker for red heds, straight, not curly. It went down past her shoulders. For her face, I picked Bluish Green eyes, a small nose, medium size mouth. Boobs medium, pegged her at 5 foot 6 with an athletically toned body. After a few more modifications, several profiles appeared on my screen. They were all minor variations of what I had selected. “These can’t be all real women on the app.”
“Tom, you almost done with the first step?” Erin ignored my question.
“Yes maam. I agree with Alex, these girls cant be real.
“Select one you like, then we will continue.” She said, matter of factly. The waitress brought over our drinks. They were all shots with chasers, I could see her carefully make sure the right shots went in front of us versus Erin. Erin picked hers up fast.
I scrolled through the ten pictures in front of me, I finally settled on one I liked. Tom did the same. We showed each other the pictures, his looked like Erin almost, though with much larger breasts and a more curvy body.
“That looks like my ex a little,” Tom said. He was right, and I did always have a crush on her, though I didn’t mean to recreate her right here.
“Okay then,” Erin said. “Lets take a shot to good fortune, and I will tell you how this will work.” She did the little three card monty trick with the two shot glasses. She then allowed us each to pick one. I picked the one up closer to me, Tom picked up the other. We toasted and downed the shots fast, I felt a little more of a kick then I was used to, but I guess it helped take the edge off.
Erin set her glass down and smiled. “So this is what’s going to happen. I should go into a little more about this app, and let you know it is more than an app, it applies some extra enhancements.
1111122.title: The app makes changes

choices: Because you were about to become to other's ideal date
You would become your ideal date, but the other would be accept it
11111223.content:
“See, dating apps are overloaded with guys, often wanting random hookups with girls that they won’t ever see again. So my friends and I thought, what if we can bring more women to the equation, and help guys know each other. So we came up with the pairing idea, find two guys, and then find one of them their perfect match, within their friend.”
Tom and I looked at each other, not sure if we believed her, or thought she was crazy.
“I know this sounds crazy, but you’ll believe it soon enough.”
“Wait a second,” Tom said. “You’re saying one of us is about to turn into a girl.”
“Yes.”
“How?”
“Combination of the app you just downloaded and the shots you just took.”
“Is it me, because I lost the first game?”
“No, that has nothing to do with it.”
“So Alex is going to turn?”
“I don’t know which of you is going to turn, but it will happen soon.”
“But we both picked out girls,” I said, calmly. “Why did we both do that if one of us is about to change?”
11111223.title: One of us was about to become female

choices: We both changed because it would turn into a double date or threesome
111112233.content:
“Because that impacts who you are about to become. The shots you just took, each contain a formula. One is going to slightly enhance one of your male selves, the other, will turn you into the woman you chose.”
“But the girl he chose doesn’t match my type,” Tom said.
“Assuming thats the change, you can accept it. It is only right he who changes to a she, likes her body. But you will get to, together, make some small modifications.
“I’m not feeling anything,” Tom said. When is this supposed to happen?”
“Soon. It will only take a couple of minutes to start, and the full change takes less than five.”
“I’m not sure what you’re smoking over there,” Tom said. “But I don’t think either of us wants to sleep with the other, we’re both dudes, it would be weird.”
“Soon, one of you will no longer be a dude, no longer think like a dude, and will be attracted to the other dude. And the dude that is still a dude, will be perfectly happy with the girl in front of him. But, its not permanent, unless you want it to be. You’ll be changed for about 12 hours, and at the end of the 12 hours you can either choose to remain how you are, or change back. The dude will remember the night, but not the changes or that his friend was a girl. And the guy that was a girl, will remember, what they choose to remember.”
There was a short silence as Tom and I took in this news, I felt stupid, realizing I should be upset, but wasn’t because I knew we should have asked what we were getting ourselves into. Tom was sweating, I think he was very nervous about the prospect of turning into a girl. I asked myself if I would sleep with him if he changed. But then Erin said I would. Was that wrong? Would he be forced into this? I guess it was no different then paying to sleep with a prostitute, which we both had done once on a trip to Mexico.
“What do you mean chooses to turn back?” I finally broke the silence as I thought about the premise of either being a woman forever, or perhaps Tom. “I don’t want to lose my best friend.”
“Think about it, best friends are hard to come by. Tonight both of you were both competing for me, what if you didn’t have to worry about that any more, you just get to spend time with your best friend and not worry about having to fight over girls.”
“But our jobs, our families?”
“We can help with the transitions, just like I’m here for you now.”
111112233.title: You would become your ideal date, but the other...

1111122332.content:
I think Tom shifted first, I could see some discomfort in his face. I first thought he was the one changing when I felt a slight cloudiness go over me and I’m sure my own face showed the same discomfort.
“Alex, I think we should go to the bathroom,” Erin said.
“Why?”
“Because your hair is turning red.”
She led me to the bathroom and held me outside the girls room as she checked it. It was empty and she walked me in and locked the door. I looked in the mirror, my hair, which was had been brown and short, was indeed almost a pure auburn by now and had extended down beyond my ears. I felt like I should have been panicking, but I wasn’t.
“Do you want to watch this happen, or do you want to wait see the final product?"
1111122332.title: I Change

choices: There is more to what she had to do
11111223322.content:
“I guess not see,” I said.
“Okay, here, put this on then.” She handed me what looked like a swimsuit. “While your body changes, this leotard will adjust and allow you to see the changes without seeing your body. You can sit in the stall or you can watch in the mirror, but you will just see the form, not your actual body. I’m going to go check on Tom and grab your phone, you’re going to need it. Lock the door behind me, I will knock. Don’t open unless you hear me calling out.”

I was worried a manager would unlock it or something. There was another knock, and I walked back into the toilet stall, just in case.
Another minute passed, and I felt my insides feel more and more weird. I groaned a little as it felt like parts of my body were retracting in on themselves. I reached towards my throat as it clinched in. I coughed, and I could hear my voice raising up in pitch.
While certain parts were retracting, I could feel my hips and chest expanding. I had to see, I stepped out of the stall. When I looked in the mirror, I first thought there was someone else in the room with me, but then I recognized the leotard, and realized how far along I was. 11111223322.title: Not See

111112233221.content:
I actually had to give him the next set of instructions. This body of yours, was your ideal. But we set it up that the other person can make minor changes, with your approval. He now has access to the many of the same profiles that you did. He has the option of swiping left or right, and then minor changes will be applied to your body. If you approve of them, then you can accept them, or you can reject them.”
“Like what changes?”
“More curves or less curves. Maybe a little taller or shorter, you were 5’10, Tom is six feet, being taller may be more matching. But we do it here, before he sees you, so when he sees you, the changes are complete and you can both accept it. Also, who you are right now, is someone who is real, we need to make changes to you so that you don’t randomly run into your identical twin.”
“That might be kind of fun though,” I said. I meant it too, but I could see her shaking her head no.
“This has the potential to be something special. You’re not the first, and we don’t want you to be the last.”
As she said that she came up to me and gave me a hug. I was shocked at the hug, but I wrapped my arms around her, it was comforting, and I needed some comfort. I was feeling like I was accepting this, but it was still an emotional situation. I felt the last of my penis shrink inside my body and my new vagina form. She let go of me and I turned towards the mirror, the weird feelings inside my body began to subside, and I could see my new body in front of me. I cupped my breasts and squeezed them, the feeling felt familiar but still so foreign. I examined other parts of my body and smiled, the feelings were good.
She made sure the door was locked. She took my phone and placed it on what looked like a charging station, as the phone connected I saw a series of images pop up next to my reflection. They were the profiles I had not chosen from. There were some added physical descriptions with them. The same profile details popped up next to mine. I finally had some details on my own physique. I was 5’5, 115 pounds. My breasts were a C cup, eyes a mix between blue and green. My hair was a natural auburn. I could also see my hip size, shoe size, and a number of other features.
“So here is what will happen, Tom’s phone is connected to yours. He will look at these profiles, then as he selects, they will mold some into your reflection, if you like what you see, you approve it, then your body will make the change, if you don’t like it, then you just decline it and nothing happens.

info.brief_description: You come across a new dating app and it will create an unforgettable experience for you.
info.description:
You're out with your friend for the evening when you get caught checking the dating app on your phone. The person who catches you, gives you the opportunity to try a new app with a guarantee. How the app works depends on the thread.

No underage stuff and nothing against someones will. Persuasion okay, but it should be a date, not something forced. Otherwise, TG, body modification and other changes are welcome.
